00053 /***************************************************************************/
00073 __STATIC_INLINE void BUS_RamBitWrite(volatile uint32_t *addr,
00074                                      unsigned int bit,
00075                                      unsigned int val)
00076 {
00077 #if defined( BITBAND_RAM_BASE )
00078   uint32_t aliasAddr =
00079     BITBAND_RAM_BASE + (((uint32_t)addr - SRAM_BASE) * 32) + (bit * 4);
00080 
00081   *(volatile uint32_t *)aliasAddr = (uint32_t)val;
00082 #else
00083   uint32_t tmp = *addr;
00084 
00085   /* Make sure val is not more than 1, because we only want to set one bit. */
00086   *addr = (tmp & ~(1 << bit)) | ((val & 1) << bit);
00087 #endif
00088 }
00089

00091 /***************************************************************************/
00112 __STATIC_INLINE unsigned int BUS_RamBitRead(volatile const uint32_t *addr,
00113                                             unsigned int bit)
00114 {
00115 #if defined( BITBAND_RAM_BASE )
00116   uint32_t aliasAddr =
00117     BITBAND_RAM_BASE + (((uint32_t)addr - SRAM_BASE) * 32) + (bit * 4);
00118 
00119   return *(volatile uint32_t *)aliasAddr;
00120 #else
00121   return ((*addr) >> bit) & 1;
00122 #endif
00123 }

00146 __STATIC_INLINE void BUS_RegBitWrite(volatile uint32_t *addr,
00147                                      unsigned int bit,
00148                                      unsigned int val)
00149 {
00150 #if defined( BITBAND_PER_BASE )
00151   uint32_t aliasAddr =
00152     BITBAND_PER_BASE + (((uint32_t)addr - PER_MEM_BASE) * 32) + (bit * 4);
00153 
00154   *(volatile uint32_t *)aliasAddr = (uint32_t)val;
00155 #else
00156   uint32_t tmp = *addr;
00157 
00158   /* Make sure val is not more than 1, because we only want to set one bit. */
00159   *addr = (tmp & ~(1 << bit)) | ((val & 1) << bit);
00160 #endif
00161 }

00185 __STATIC_INLINE unsigned int BUS_RegBitRead(volatile const uint32_t *addr,
00186                                             unsigned int bit)

00188 #if defined( BITBAND_PER_BASE )

00193 #else

00219 __STATIC_INLINE void BUS_RegMaskedSet(volatile uint32_t *addr,
00220                                       uint32_t mask)
00221 {
00222 #if defined( PER_BITSET_MEM_BASE )
00223   uint32_t aliasAddr = PER_BITSET_MEM_BASE + ((uint32_t)addr - PER_MEM_BASE);
00224   *(volatile uint32_t *)aliasAddr = mask;
00225 #else
00226   *addr |= mask;
00227 #endif
00228 }
00229 
00230 
00231 /***************************************************************************/
00251 __STATIC_INLINE void BUS_RegMaskedClear(volatile uint32_t *addr,
00252                                         uint32_t mask)
00253 {
00254 #if defined( PER_BITCLR_MEM_BASE )
00255   uint32_t aliasAddr = PER_BITCLR_MEM_BASE + ((uint32_t)addr - PER_MEM_BASE);
00256   *(volatile uint32_t *)aliasAddr = mask;
00257 #else
00258   *addr &= ~mask;
00259 #endif
00260 }

00263 /***************************************************************************/
00283 __STATIC_INLINE void BUS_RegMaskedWrite(volatile uint32_t *addr,
00284                                         uint32_t mask,
00285                                         uint32_t val)
00286 {
00287 #if defined( PER_BITCLR_MEM_BASE )
00288   BUS_RegMaskedClear(addr, mask);
00289   BUS_RegMaskedSet(addr, val);
00290 #else
00291   *addr = (*addr & ~mask) | val;
00292 #endif
00293 }

00313 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t BUS_RegMaskedRead(volatile const uint32_t *addr,
00314                                            uint32_t mask)
00315 {
00316   return *addr & mask;
00317 }
